page.title: 09WORSHIP IN MIDDLETON
page.content: There are 22 listed places of worship in Middleton, 5 Roman Catholic, 9 Church of England, 1 Baptist, 3 Methodist, 2 United Reform, 1 Jehovah's Witness and 1 Mormon. There are no non-Christian places of worship in the official list. Questionaires were given to 575 boys & girls attending Hollin High School asking for information regarding their families' patterns of worship. Only 255 (44.3%) returned the completed questionaires. From these 255 families, 39.1% attended Church, made up as follows:- 2.6% attended Roman Catholic, 31.1% attended Church of England, 5.3% attended the Independant Churches None claimed attendance at any non-Christian places of worship outside Middleton.
